name: Piconet
overview:
TPark - SMS parking payment solution

TPark is a SaaS (Software as a Service) solution available to parking owners or administrators developed by Piconet since 2006: www.tpark.ro. TPark allows drivers to pay for parking in a very convenient way, using the mobile phone. TPark has two payment models: pay by premium SMS (MT or MO) and prepaid vouchers with call validation. TPark is working both on smartphones with dedicated Apps “SMS Parking Romania” and normal feature phones.

TPark is live in 5 cities in Romania serving over 200K clients: Timisoara, Oradea, Satu-Mare, Arad & Baia Mare since 2006, with more than two million payments last year. TPark by SMS allows payments for fixed parking durations (30 mins, one hour, full day) with a SMS reminder when the time has expired so the driver can extend his parking period without exceeding the duration and the risk of a penalty. The driver only needs to text the license plate number of the car and the code area to a short number to pay for the parking. TPark by voucher allows parking payment for flexible periods of time. The driver calls a number to initiate the parking time and calls back when he wants to leave, like having his own parking meter.

Advantages for drivers: They can pay for the exact duration of the parking, via the voucher system For those who prefer to pay a parking period in advance by SMS, there is the reminder when the time has expired, so they can pay for another period, with no need to go back to the parking space They don’t need change as they use their cell phone to pay for the parking They have detailed information about the parking using the smartphone app, which is very convenient for drivers visiting the area the first time It is convenient as they don’t need to walk to the meter or look for the point of payment

Advantages for parking companies: Flexibility: new tariffs, durations, areas, discounts can be easily ad or modify in the system No initial investment Allows loyalty programs, each driver is unique identified in the system by his cell phone number Reduce costs with handling cash and printing parking tickets, TPark by SMS is a green solution, paperless More and more people are using cell phone payment as is much more convenient Real time reporting about parking payments and usage. Parking companies can monitor for each parking zone how many parking space are used every hour, when the capacity is full or to low. Real time monitoring of parking employees: their activity can be tracked in detail, knowing their location (past and current) TPark makes the parking process more easier for both the drivers and parking companies

The system can be hosted on Amazon Web Services, localized to Greek in no time at all. Tpark uses standard communication protocols to the SMSC of the MNOs. PICONET owns IP for the system and can provide round the clock support.
